Class InternshipService

Object
InternshipService
public class InternshipService extends Object
Service class for managing internship Handles internship creation, deletion, edit and changes

  • Method Details

    • proposeInternship

      public InternshipOpportunity proposeInternship(String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajors, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int numOfSlots, String createdBy, String companyName) throws MaxExceedException
      create new internship
      Parameters:
      title - title
      description - description of internship
      level - level of internship
      preferredMajors - preferred major
      openingDate - opening date
      closingDate - closing date
      numOfSlots - number of approved application slot
      createdBy - rep's ID
      companyName - company name
      Throws:
      MaxExceedException - if the company creates max number of allocated internship

    • addInternship

      public void addInternship(InternshipOpportunity internship)
      add internship to repo
      Parameters:
      internship - internship object

    • setVisibility

      public void setVisibility(String internshipId, boolean visible)
      changes the visibility of given internship
      Parameters:
      internshipId - internship id
      visible - on or off visibility
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if the internship yet to be approved by career staff

    • ableToEditInternship

      private boolean ableToEditInternship(InternshipOpportunity internship)
      checks whether internship can be edited
      Parameters:
      internship - internship object

    • editInternship

      public void editInternship(String internshipId, String title, String description, String preferredMajors, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, Integer slot, InternshipLevel level) throws ObjectNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException
      Edits an existing internship opportunity.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - Unique ID of the internship to edit
      title - New title for the internship (null if not changing)
      description - New description for the internship (null if not changing)
      preferredMajors - New preferred majors for the internship (null if not changing)
      openingDate - New opening date for the internship (null if not changing)
      closingDate - New closing date for the internship (null if not changing)
      slot - New number of slots for the internship (null if not changing)
      level - New level for the internship (null if not changing)
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException - if the internship with the given ID does not exist
      SecurityException - if the internship cannot be edited due to its current status
      IllegalArgumentException

    • removeInternship

      public void removeInternship(String repId, String internshipId) throws ObjectNotFoundException
      deleted internship
      Parameters:
      repId - rep's ID
      internshipId - internship's ID
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException - if internship can not be found
      SecurityException - if internship is not in pending state or wrong person accessing it

    • parseLevel

      public static InternshipLevel parseLevel(String s, boolean allowNull)
      Parses a string to an InternshipLevel enum. Checks for valid input.
      Parameters:
      s - The string representation of the internship level
      allowNull - Whether null values are allowed (for edit mode)
      Returns:
      The corresponding InternshipLevel enum
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input is invalid or null

    • checkValidSlots

      public static void checkValidSlots(Integer slots, boolean allowNull)
      Validates the number of slots for an internship.
      Parameters:
      slots - The number of slots to validate
      allowNull - Whether null values are allowed (for edit mode)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of slots is out of range or null when not allowed
